Name: Maple Pomme
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring ginger ale.
Garnish with apple wedge on rim.
Review: Scotch based drink for warm weather.
History: Adapted from a short drink created in 2005 by Tonin Kacaj at Maze in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Maple Pomme contains 223 calories
